sub_tasks.requirements: Correctly calculates patient age at admission and filters for the range 65-75 using `(p.anchor_age + EXTRACT(YEAR FROM a.admittime) - p.anchor_year) BETWEEN 65 AND 75`.
Correctly identifies the first ICU stay per hospital admission using `ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY a.hadm_id ORDER BY i.intime)` and filtering for `rn = 1`.
Correctly identifies patients with pulmonary embolism by checking both ICD-9 ('4151%') and ICD-10 ('I26%') codes and using the `icd_version` column.
Identifies diagnostic procedures by counting distinct `itemid`s from the `procedureevents` table.
Correctly joins `patients`, `admissions`, and `icustays` tables on `subject_id` and `hadm_id` to form the base cohort.
Correctly links the cohort to the `diagnoses_icd` table on `hadm_id` to filter for pulmonary embolism.
Correctly uses a `LEFT JOIN` to connect the cohort with `procedureevents` on `stay_id`, ensuring patients with no procedures are not excluded.
Correctly filters procedures to those occurring within the first 72 hours of the ICU stay using `pe.starttime BETWEEN pc.intime AND DATETIME_ADD(pc.intime, INTERVAL 72 HOUR)`.
Correctly calculates per-stay metrics: ICU LOS in days and the count of unique diagnostic procedures.
Correctly stratifies patients into four quartiles based on the diagnostic procedure count using `NTILE(4) OVER (ORDER BY cm.diagnostic_intensity_72hr)`.
Correctly groups results by quartile and calculates the required final metrics: N, mean procedure count, mean ICU LOS, and hospital mortality percentage.
